rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
Let's hurry.
Let's get inside before the enemy invades.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0004
rows.name: Here... our bodies are here, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0005
rows.name: Notification from Central Life Control System.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Remaining system energy has dropped
below zero point two.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
One thousand seconds until defensive
field disappearance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0009
rows.name: It will only last fifteen minutes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Anyway, if the energy runs out,
it's pointless even if only the field remains.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0011
rows.name: If we activate the backup system[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0012
rows.name:
The operation time limit will be extended,
and the defensive field can be maintained too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0013
rows.name: If we can maintain the defensive field[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0014
rows.name:
We might be able to force the enemy,
who has limited supplies, to retreat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12050100_MSG0015
rows.name:
Exactly.
Everything depends on whether we can secure the backup system.[ST:wait ]
